title: NickofTime
author: NickofTime
content: Looking for a dedicated device that would run 24/7 and my main consideration was Raspberry Pi 4 but as it turns out the Raspberry Pi foundation stopped servicing the retail sector because they realized they'd make more money servicing the industrial and government sector. I'm not sure what the tried alternatives are. I'm essentially looking for a single-board computer, but I'm willing to go all the way to a minipc if I have to. Perhaps a Mac Mini?
